messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 2041
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/10/02 12:45:48 PM Central Daylight Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:  Not
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/10/02 12:45:48 PM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< . (In FL they have to be on grade level) >>

Not trying to be contrary, but that isn't true.
I only want to point this out to keep people from being scared of FL law.
Some of the evaluators try to convince you that they must be at grade level,
but in reality the law states that you must document improvement every year.
That's all.
And here in FL you don't even have to see an evaluator at all if you don't
want to.

I did enjoy hearing about your dd's amazing the evaluator Rebecca!!!
That's great.
Ren
